name: Golurk
author: kawayoo
flavor_text: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

ancient_trait.name: θ  Stop
ancient_trait.effect: Prevent all effects of your opponent’s Pokémon’s Abilities done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Double Type
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in play, it is {P} and {F} type.

attacks.name: Superpower
attacks.effect: You may do 40 more damage. If you do, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.
